website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular inflatable beer pong table dedicated to keeping your beer cold and your friends happy.
pros: Built-in cooler keeps drinks refreshingly cold
Can hold up to 28 cups across the entire float
Comes with five beer pong balls, with pockets for easy storage
cons: A few customers wish the cups were touching rather than spaced apart

customer_reviews.title: So fun, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: So this float was amazing, such thick material and lots of fun. However, the cooler cover ripped at the seam which created a hole and the air deflated. Honestly the float was so cool I was way more bummed I couldn't play with it anymore rather than upset about my money. I did contact the company with a picture and they immediately responded. refunding me in full without even receiving the product back. Worth buying this floaty especially knowing if anything happens the company has great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! We’ve purchased other pool games before but this one is our favorite by far. There are lots of drink holders and two holders for the pong balls. The cooler in the center is a great idea but doesn’t keep it cold very long. The only thing I didn’t remember to do is purchase cups to play, but other than that you are good to get it out of the box, inflate, and play! We had a cookout with friends and we’ve already recommended it to two other families. Our kids play pong too so we’ve had family competitions and it really gets everyone together and having fun. You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hartlove

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the pool!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on our group trip to Palm Springs. I figured it would give us something to do in the pool rather than just float around. It was perfect and a fun game! We didn't test out the cooler with ice and drinks, but instead used it as part of our game too! Fun times!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: It stays inflated for such a long period of time with a extremely study pump hole to make sure no air gets out. The cooler is a cool feature although it isn't isolated so keeping stuff actually cold is hard but is nice if you have no where else to put your extra drinks at!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McLeroy

customer_reviews.title: Perpetual Last Cup Syndrome
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really think about it when I ordered it, but the fact that the cups don't touch (notice how the holders are not directly adjacent) makes it hard to play. Basically, every cup is last cup. Dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Shephard

customer_reviews.title: Pool party must have!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome for the hot miami days I have all year round. Hold enough cups for a solid game of beer pong and is stable enough to use as a float when no game is going on. The "cooler" holds plenty of extra beers. I like to keep ice packets at the bottom and in between the beers just to keep them extra cold. The sun down here is no joke. Overall, great party extra to have when having some friends over.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Failed to hold air
customer_reviews.text: save your money - this is a very poor product - brand new pool and it just leaked and leaked - no one could keep up with it :(
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Fun! But not the same as actual beer pong.
customer_reviews.text: The cups are spaced farther apart than the normal beer pong set up so it I see much harder to make cups since there's a half inch gap in between each cup. Also the package didn't not include the ping pong balls so we couldn't play the first day we brought it out to the lake because we thought they were included. Nice cup holders and interesting design with the cooler which is convenient. Holds air well and is still fun!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kuss

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is a good idea but doesn’t keep drinks cold. Fun game played on the lake. Served its purpose. Wish it had holes on the side to put poles in to stake it to the ground or to tie it up because you have to hold it steady while playing or it floats away. Regardless still had fun using it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Oldham

customer_reviews.title: he really loved it and it was lots of fun to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought and gave to my Dad for Father's Day, he really loved it and it was lots of fun to play in the pool. Only suggestion would to have some sort of weight as you have to hold it from moving all the time. It is worth the price and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Muska

customer_reviews.title: Great product even though I don't use it much
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Quality is good and works as you would expect. That being said, playing beer pong outside on the water is harder than you would expect. Feel like I should have bought some heavier ping pong balls because the wind really takes them away.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed. I bought this product with the understanding there ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I bought this product with the understanding there is an insulated cooler in the middle of this awesome beer pong raft. After airing the H2PONG Inflatable Beer Pong Raft up there was no insulated cooler present. The beer pong portion is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: ... this thing over the summer and it held up pretty well. No actual holes in it
customer_reviews.text: We used the heck out of this thing over the summer and it held up pretty well. No actual holes in it, but some people got a little to rowdy and ripped off the top of the cooler. We cut the top off and used the patch kit to repair the hole. No problems since :-)
customer_reviews.author: Blecka

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a pool party
customer_reviews.text: only lasted a couple of weeks. After that it started to leak air and would only retain air for a couple of hours. Look for a stronger material. If not you will be throwing this pong float away after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G

customer_reviews.title: Popped after one use
customer_reviews.text: The lining in the cupholder split after one use. Wasn't able to be patched, if we want to use it we have to blow it up every 10 minutes. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KL Cutlip

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: THis is great! its a little hard since the cups push up a little high, but fun.
customer_reviews.author: AD_13

customer_reviews.title: Fun Beer Pong in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the BF, we purchased a house with a pool, so he invited his unit over for a BBQ and they had a blast playing beer pong in the pool all day.
customer_reviews.author: Leaf

customer_reviews.title: this table is well made, delivery was quick, ...
customer_reviews.text: this table is well made, delivery was quick, the only problem we had is only had 3 balls with it when arrived.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Beer Pong at its best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool entertainment game!! This is our second purchase, the first we took to Mexico to our resort and what a hit it was!! People begged us to leave it. Anybody looking for a durable fun summer game I would totally recommend it. Eddie Reed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that fact that when you are not using this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that fact that when you are not using this as a pong table you can use it as a float. Our pool is not that big but this is the perfect size to still be able to play and have some room left.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It's great because all cups are evenly apart- I recommend putting ...
customer_reviews.text: We play this game every summer and after many years of ours getting beat up we decided to purchase this one. It's great because all cups are evenly apart- I recommend putting a small cooler in the cooler to keep drinks colder and ice from melting fast but definitely having a middle cooler portion is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mahm55n

customer_reviews.title: Beer Cooler is key for this game.  No one had to get out of the pool to refill.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to Lake Powell, used noodles to sit on. Made it very challenging but a blast. Beer cooler in the middle was nice so we didn't have to keep going to get more beer.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the party!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's dirty 30 birthday party and it was a Hit! Even after everyone was done with the pool, we just put it on top of our table. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Bwahahah... I may or may not have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bwahahah...I may or may not have brought this to a company picnic over the summer. Rave reviews. Worth noting that the cups are not spaced immediately next to eachother so they touch, they are spaced apart.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my children that just put a pool in there home. They love it with there friends.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: I went through three of these floats last year and the first one this year lasted one use. They've all ended up with undetectable leaks somewhere... such that you can't find the leak to patch it. Decent otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Pool fun
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice but having the ball holders on the sides and the cooler spot in the middle is awesome! The cooler isn't really one but is a spot to hold extra cans & ice--melted fast.
customer_reviews.author: HNavratil

customer_reviews.title: idea is great just wish we could have used it
customer_reviews.text: Took it out of box today blew it up, unfortunately it won't hold air. We're going to try to figure out where it's losing air from. Delivery was fast, idea is great just wish we could have used it. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great. But after being blown up the next day ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. But after being blown up the next day it was completely flat. For the amount of money I spent I expected it to stay fully inflated. Kind of disappointed as I read great reviews on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome. I can't wait to use it at cookouts/pool ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I can't wait to use it at cookouts/pool parties. All my friends are going to love it. Great price and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: julie32

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite game at the lake! We played for hours. Must buy for summer!
customer_reviews.author: karinaecruz

customer_reviews.title: Beer pong in the pool!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun with this beer pong float. Everyone had a great time using it.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun, does what is expected but not really a cooler. Enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: MMC

customer_reviews.title: I specifically bought this for the built in cooler, ...
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this for the built in cooler , I couldve bought a $20 one that didnt have one but i figured id pay the extra $20 for a guaranteed cooler. but there wasn't one. Was disappointing. Other than that, the actual item does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The game is great but do not expect to keep anything cold in the "cooler"

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: This Item is only going to get a 3 star because I paid a lot for a not so great product. It deflated very often had to inflate it way to much.
customer_reviews.author: Ryssa and Joe

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for one of these for years. Every single one i have found was out of my price range until i came across this one. I had to buy it as soon as i saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay n Tori

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun addition to lake and pool outings! Just like described!

customer_reviews.title: this inflatable table is solid, though i must note ...
customer_reviews.text: this inflatable table is solid, though i must note that it may deflate a little but im sure its just the plastic streaching out i guess, not very noticible but does throw you off at first use. havnt located any holes or imperfections but only time will tell huh?
customer_reviews.author: Manuel P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun time !!
customer_reviews.text: Used this all summer and it was a blast to play !! Very durable and super fun !
customer_reviews.author: Donato

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! It's very challenging
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It's very challenging, the balls bounce every where. It also comes with a couple patches which is great.

customer_reviews.title: Gave it as a gift and they loved it. Great summertime entertainment for the pool
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and they loved it. Great summertime entertainment for the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Perreca

customer_reviews.title: Needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: The cooler lid doesn't have any Velcro or latch to hold it closed. The weight of drinks etc inside the cooler ripped a hole at the seem. We got a few hours of use out of it. It was fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Granning

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool gift.
customer_reviews.text: Quick hole in it. Other than that a fun buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Klimson

customer_reviews.title: Fun experience. Too pricey for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in the product. Middle cooler area ripped off. Material of the entire product is not that great. Used once and gave it away for free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! We brought this with us on our vacation to Saint Lucia. It held up so well that we were able to bring it home for future trips! We were also the coolest people to hang out with because everyone wanted to play beer pong in the pool. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Terra Guaba

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and is exactly as described in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and is exactly as described in the description. We actually prefer playing with this beer pong in the pool vs playing regular beer pong, because it is much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick L. Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: This was used for about 20 mins before the air ...
customer_reviews.text: This was used for about 20 mins before the air started leaking out of one of the seams. They did give patches, but where the thing started coming apart it doesnt stay. 5
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle Petrovic

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as described. The first one wouldn't stay inflated so the company sent me another one which has held air. Good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Timely arrival
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in a timely manner. It is a door prize item, so it is still in the box. But I am sure the winner will love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: D. Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Bit dificult use since the pool moves but a good idea during summer to stay cool.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this float!! The cooler is a really cool future, it truly does hold at least a 8 pack of beer with ice! It is very fun, and I also like how the balls were included.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this inflatable definitely gonna have lots of fun plenty of room for everyone and pretty durable for the price

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loves this game. The little ones ...
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves this game. The little ones do too and use juice/water or just play it as a contest.

customer_reviews.title: X-MAS PRESENT
customer_reviews.text: I can't review it because it is a Christmas present. My only comment: The box should be stronger. The item is so heavy that the box was opened when it arrived; however, nothing was missing.
customer_reviews.author: MBB

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Was a huge hit at the bachelor party! Makes playing beer pong a lot harder when floating in the pool

customer_reviews.title: It was a lot of fun though and worked perfectly in the pool
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely harder than it looks compared to table pong. It was a lot of fun though and worked perfectly in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please replace this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and gave it to my friend we used it once! And it went flat and won’t hold air at all a 1 time use for 30$ not cool
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for pool recreation.
customer_reviews.text: easy to inflate. Holds the air well. Haven't used the cooler yet as we were drinking Mojitos. My wife beat me the first two games we played. Don't know if you could fix that. Beats just floating around doing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: We love this! This thing is PERFECT and so much ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this! This thing is PERFECT and so much fun! It brings hours of extra fun in the pool! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it....until the cooler cover ripped at the connection point. That being said, I ordered another one because overall, the main part of the table was very sturdy. We had a lot of fun with it last weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase for our pool, so much fun. Only slight drawback is I wish the cooler was a little better but still so worth the purchase. May buy another one in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ddm

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This product had a hole in it when it arrived at my house for a 4 of July party and I did not get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: travis s.

customer_reviews.title: The item is great used as a game but not as a floatation ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is great used as a game but not as a floatation device. Someone laid on the floatie and the seam tore where the cooler lid closes. We used this for 1 day and now it's unusable. Seems are not well put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: The children had fun using the beer pong table as a floatie and the adults had fun playing beer pong when the kids had moved on to something else, overall fun for all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: Was a great thing until a hole appeared by the lid area in the middle. Up until this point this was a 5 star. Of course the issue occurred just a few days after I could no longer send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is always a hit at pool parties! Would have ...
customer_reviews.text: Is always a hit at pool parties! Would have given it 5 stars, but the 1 we received had a hole in it before we even started inflating it. Had to use 1 of the few patches it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the item was damaged. The cooler part had a defect at the seams. It was mot sew

customer_reviews.text: the cooler part is a bit deceiving - it definitely doesn't fit a 12 pack. otherwise it works well and is exactly what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and popped a hole. Won't order again.

customer_reviews.title: Missing ping pong balls.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, heavy gauge material
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy duty material large size really easy to blow up with a pump. Lots of fun, took a couple extra days shipping but was informed the whole time.

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: The cups are too far apart. They should be touching. Poor design. It's like throwing at a single cup each time. Also, very difficult to put cups in the hole when fully inflated.

customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the pool. Cup holes a little farther apart than on a table but just added to the challenge.

product_meta.title: Play Platoon H2PONG Inflatable Beer Pong Raft With Cooler, Includes 5 Ping Pong Balls - Floating Pool Party Game Float Set with Built In Cooler
feature_bullets: BUILT IN COOLER holds 18 drinks plus ice.
INCLUDES 5 PONG BALLS for hours of beer pong partying.
HOLDS 28 CUPS: 10 cups in each end rack and 4 cups along both sides for extra fun.
EXTRA THICK PLASTIC for strength and durability. Scratch and tear resistant.
6 FT x 3 FT, quick & easy to inflate, can be used as a full size personal pool lounge.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars205 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
